name: DreamFace Interactive
tag_list: widget-platform, interactive, mashups, personalized, ajax, web2-0, enterprise2-0, soa, composite-applications, portals, web-services, mobile-widgets
overview:
Who is DreamFace Interactive?

DreamFace Interactive develops and markets a revolutionary Open Source Interactive Widget Platform for creating Web and Enterprise 2.0 Applications and Mashups.

What is DreamFace? DreamFace is an open source widget platform for creating Web / Enterprise 2.0 Applications, Mashups and Business Intelligence Dashboards. DreamFace empowers developers in a disciplined approach to Web 2.0 application development and allows business users to personalize and share their own widget-based applications using an easy Design Studio and High-Level editors. DreamFace Interactive applications are object oriented and built in a legoâ„¢ like concept using Widgets as application building blocks. DreamFace Widgets can use diverse data sources combining corporate data and internet data and link them through user defined interactions to other Widgets, into a coherent personalized view of the information.

What can I build?

DreamFace incorporates the major concepts of Web 2.0 and allows users to create Personalized and Sharable Enterprise Web 2.0 Mashups, Composite Applications, and Personal Analytic Dashboards for Business Intelligence.
